nodes.text: The Great Amulets were a group of three Sith amulets created by the Dark Jedi Exile Sorzus Syn some time after her arrival on Korriban in 6900 BBY. The Muur Talisman, the first of the amulets created by Syn, was gifted to her fellow Jen'jidai Karness Muur, while the second—the Dreypa Talisman—was crafted specifically for Baron Remulus Dreypa. According to her chronicle, Syn had intended to create the third for her own personal use, though the specific details of its creation were unknown to later Force users. In notes written in the margins of the Book of Sith, Luke Skywalker expressed hope that the Great Amulets and other artifacts like them had not survived the passage of the millennia.
